title: Cheryl and Kevin
creator_credit: Michael Thornhill, Timothy Read and Film Australia
brief_description: Cheryl and Kevin are a young couple who have married before either was ready for the experience. Depicts and provokes thought about one of the major social problems to emerge from modern society and the changing values of young people.
creator_credit_for_label: Michael Thornhill, Timothy Read and Film Australia
